Apex Legends new season brings you tons of awesome players. Welcome to mobile Offline, We share the best game for andriod and other mobile system,for more of our contents visit our official youtube channel here

Apex Legends is a free-to-play battle royale-hero shooter game developed by Respawn Entertainment and was published by Electronics Arts. This game provide challenges up to 60 weapons. The player get to join groups of three and as usual, the last group standing can declare themselves winners.

Download Apex Legends Apk Download Game Obb File

Information

  • Name: Apex Legends Mobile
  • Category : Action
  • Size : 60MB
  • Obb File : 1.2GB
  • Game mode : Offline/Online

How to install the game

  1. Download the above Apk file.
  2. Install it on your required Andriod Phone.
  3. Launch the game, Move Obb File to Andriod/Obb/com.ea.gp.apexlegendsmobilefps.
  4. Re-Lauch Apex Legend's with Additional files updated Automatically and enjoy.
